meta.description: Optimize the purchase of restaurants to maximize annual income within a budget constraint.

sets.name: RESTAURANTS
sets.description: Set of restaurants available for purchase.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost in millions to purchase each restaurant.

vars.name: purchase
vars.description: Binary decision variable indicating whether to purchase each restaurant.

objective.name: max_total_income
objective.description: Maximize the total annual income from purchased restaurants.

constraints.name: budget_constraint
constraints.description: Total cost of purchased restaurants must not exceed the budget.

constraints.name: mutual_exclusivity_D_A
constraints.description: If Restaurant D is purchased, Restaurant A cannot be purchased.
